## Steps

- [ ] Check if NERF was submitted?

## Software Checklist
Ask Supervisor what the new hire will need
- [ ]  Adobe
- [ ]  ArcGIS 
- [ ]  AutoCAD/AutoCAD 3D
- [ ]  BlueBeam 
>if user wants both (Adobe & BlueBeam), ask why?
- [ ]  SketchUp 
- [ ]  MS Project
- [ ]  MS Visio
Order software from CTM [here](https://cityofaustin.sharepoint.com/sites/CTM/TEAMSITES/AS/MSELA/Lists/MicrosoftFY24DepartmentTransactions/Customer%20View.aspx?%3D&sdata=WlNGR0ZyRU9JVHNCcUJXSDloTVEyMm1ocGhNM0tVN21Pc2hCZUkrV0Mzcz0%3D&ovuser=5c5e19f6-a6ab-4b45-b1d0-be4608a9a67f%2CDiana.Martin%40austintexas.gov&OR=Teams-HL&CT=1708706699063&clickparams=eyJBcHBOYW1lIjoiVGVhbXMtRGVza3RvcCIsIkFwcFZlcnNpb24iOiIyNy8yNDAxMDQxNzUwMyIsIkhhc0ZlZGVyYXRlZFVzZXIiOmZhbHNlfQ%3D%3D)

## Hardware Checklist
>Does the user need a GIS Modeling computer?
- [ ]  GIS Laptop w/ specialist docking station
- [ ]  Laptop
- [ ]  Power supply
- [ ]  Docking station
- [ ]  Monitors
- [ ]  Keyboard (hardwired)
- [ ]  Mouse (hardwired)
- [ ]  MiFi (must be request by the supervisor)
